name: Kanenson, Appellant, v. Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company
name_abbreviation: Kanenson v. Mutual of Omaha Insurance

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jonhs, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Beuu and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the decision of this case.
parties: Kanenson, Appellant, v. Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs on appellant.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Beuu and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Milton B. Riskin, with him McFadden, Riskin and Huston, for appellant.
John F. Oldt, with him Fox, Oldt & Hambrook, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kanenson, Appellant, v. Mutual of Omaha Insurance Company.
Argued April 22, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jonhs, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Milton B. Riskin, with him McFadden, Riskin and Huston, for appellant.
John F. Oldt, with him Fox, Oldt & Hambrook, for appellee.
March 20, 1972:
